page.title: 17MY HOBBY - HORSE RIDING 1
page.content: AN IMPORTANT FEATURE OF HOME LIFE FOR ME IS GETTING UP AT BETWEEN 5.3O AND 6AM, SO THAT I CAN DO OUR HORSES PROPERLY AND NOT BE LATE FOR SCHOOL. THE FIRST THING TO DO IS TO GIVE THEM THEIR FEEDS OF BRAN, CHAFF, PONY NUTS AND HAY. IF THE HORSES ARE GOING TO BE WORKED THAT DAY, THEN I GIVE THEM SOAKED SUGAR BEET WITH THE FEED. I HAVE TO WET DOWN ONE OF THE HORSES' HAY, AS SHE IS ALLERGIC TO DUST AND THE WATER SETTLES IT. THE BIG THING WITH HORSES IS TO BE PATIENT BUT FIRM AND NOT TO SHOUT OR LOSE YOUR TEMPER AS THAT WORKS WITH FEW. YOU SHOULD PRAISE THE HORSE OR PONY WHEN IT HAS DONE RIGHT AND JUST SPEAK SOFTLY BUT FIRMLY WHEN WRONG. FEW HORSES HAVE REAL MALICE. THEY ARE NAUGHTY WHEN FRIGHTENED OR JUST OUT OF STUBBORNESS.
